channel.title: Java Question
channel.description: Is it possible to make a java file do something, if the focus gets lost from the command prompt window? or would that only work in a JFrame?

item.title: Java Question
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

You mean like, have the console be interactive with the program without using a GUI? Yes, very possible.
like to create a program that multiplies two numbers; in your run.bat, add this:

set /P a=Number 1: 
set /P a=Number 2:

Then you would add a new value for the two numbers.

int numberOne = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
int numberTwo = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);

Then you would have an output like so:

System.out.println(numberOne * numberTwo);

Voila.

Read full topic
